actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency..

official_title: A bill to amend section 5(c) of the Home Owners Loan Act of 1933 to authorize an increase in the principal amount of mortgages on properties in Alaska, Guam, and Hawaii to compensate for higher prevailing costs.

summary.text: Authorizes an increase, under the Home Owners Loan Act, of up to 50 percent of the dollar amount otherwise applicable in the principal amount of mortgages on properties in Alaska, Guam, and Hawaii. (Amends 12 U.S.C. 1464(c))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5(c) of the Home Owners Loan Act of 1933 to authorize an increase in the principal amount of mortgages on properties in Alaska, Guam, and Hawaii to compensate for higher prevailing costs.
